River 2: BTN checks back without kicker edge; bets thin if blocker advantage
Turn 9s favors BB coverage: BB probe_turns half_pot_50 ~3.0bb

Flop K73r: BTN checks back some mediums; small_cbet_33 with range edge otherwise
